value.0: I bid you welcome to the Winter Palace, temple to the frostmaiden Auril.
May you feel the coldness of Auril's icy embrace.
May the frostmaiden Auril protect you from the elements.
I shall heal you of all wounds and ailments.
We only offer our services to those who we deem our worthy. Perhaps if you can help us solve a problem, you will earn that right as well as the favor of Auril.
Then we have nothing more to discuss.
Serana, one of our own appears to have... fallen in love. She no longer visits the Winter Palace nor does she pay respect to the frostmaiden. She has forsaken us and our order.

This is not something we can overlook. You must eliminate her and bring me her amulet as proof of her death. That amulet is a keepsake passed on from her father, and we will know for certain her fate should you retrieve that.
Then I await your decision.
You will earn the favor of the frostmaiden. But if that is not enough, we will give you an item blessed by hers truly, as well as offer you temple services.

She has been seen in the company of a soldier from Taerl's forces. You will likely find her in somewhere in their enclave. Return to me with her amulet and we may also offer you an item blessed by the frostmaiden herself.
When you are mortally wounded in battle, you will respawn here.
You are already set to respawn here.
May the blessing of Tyr be upon you. Travel safe.
It shall be done.
I can confirm that this is Serana's amulet. I trust that she is dead - good. We will now offer you temple services, such as healing, buffing, and a respawn point.
Ah, and I have not forgotten. You may have this cloak as well. It is blessed by the frostmaiden. You may find it helpful if you find her loving, cold embrace too much for you.
Farewell.
Can you please give me a buff?
Can you please heal me?
I would like to set my respawn point to here.
Not interested.
What is this problem you are having?
I'll need to think about it.
What's in it for me?
Forget it. I won't stand in the way of love.
I'll do it.
Farewell.
Can you please heal me?
I have her amulet here.
